articles.title: Virat Kohli reveals emotions on return to cricket after 2-month break: 'Haven't been off the media radar' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Virat Kohli last played a competitive match in January this year and will be looking to make a mark in the IPL with the T20 World Cup around the corner. | Cricket
articles.content: Virat Kohli took the field at the Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru on Monday for the first time since he last played a competitive cricket match in January this year. Kohli joined the rest of the Roy… [+2489 chars]

articles.title: Rajasthan Royals' Jethalal post leads meme fest as women's team ends RCB's 16-year title drought - The Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: A clinical Royal Challengers Bangalore won the Women's Premier League 2024 title with an eight-wicket victory over Delhi Capitals in the final on Sund

articles.title: [Watch] Rashid Khan's MS Dhoni-Esque No-Look Six Vs Ireland Wows IPL 2024 Fans - OneCricket
